item.title: CORS Misconfiguration to Account Takeover
item.author: max.randhahn@yahoo.de (Max)
item.description: During an assesment, I uncovered a chain of exploits that began with a CORS misconfiguration and culminated in an account takeover / authentication bypass via XPath injection in an API endpoint.

item.title: Reflected XSS to Account Takeover
item.author: max.randhahn@yahoo.de (Max)
item.description: The Vulnerabillity # When researching an application, I noticed that there was a feature for resetting the email address of our user.
